SPMIDI_Orchestra* SPMIDI_GetCompiledOrchestra ( void   ) 

int SPMIDI_SetDrumMap ( SPMIDI_Orchestra *  orchestra,
int  bankIndex,
int  programIndex,
int  noteIndex,
int  insIndex,
int  pitch 
)

Map a MIDI drum pitch to an instrument index.

This allows multiple drums to be mapped to a single instrument.

Parameters:
noteIndex MIDI pitch of note on rhythm channel that triggers this drum
insIndex index used when defining instrument with SPMIDI_SetInstrumentDefinition()
pitch pitch of instrument when playing this drum sound

int SPMIDI_SetInstrumentDefinition ( SPMIDI_Orchestra *  orchestra,
int  insIndex,
ResourceTokenMap_t *  tokenMap,
unsigned char *  data,
int  numBytes 
)

Used internally by Instrument Editor This is not normally called by an application.

API is subject to change without notice.

Author:
Phil Burk, Copyright 2002 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL Download an instrument definition as a byte stream.
Parameters:
insIndex index within internal presets array

int SPMIDI_SetInstrumentMap ( SPMIDI_Orchestra *  orchestra,
int  bankIndex,
int  programIndex,
int  insIndex 
)

Map a MIDI program number to an instrument index.

This allows multiple programs to be mapped to a single instrument.
